game.name: Goob Wants an Android Girlfriend
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A cute puzzle game about fixing up android girls! Solve the puzzles and grow your collection of girlfriends!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cute puzzle game about fixing up android girls! Solve the puzzles and grow your collection of girlfriends!
